title: Residential Land sale in Pannipitiya
details:
7.35 perches available in Hokandara rd, Pannipitya.
Calm and peaceful residential area.
Fully cleared documentations with all approvals including historical plans.
Easily can go for a bank loan.
5mints to high level road, railway station,nursing home and Dharmapala vidyalaya Pannipitiya.
